Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: “I just want to be able to [follow impulses] and not worry about the consequences.”   Dang that hits me hard. I’ve done this with so many things. Running, drinking, restricting. Consequences always follow though, for better or worse. The physics of choosing...action and reaction.   I want to learn how to feel ok with myself in ways that are healthy instead of destructive, that connect me to a community instead of isolate me. In ways that are real and lasting instead of illusory. (*wry laugh* it’s my own insomniac ‘prayer of saint francis’ )
